means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 格拉登取自父名，来源于Glad↑1，含义是“格拉德之子”(son of Glad)

sentence.Network_en: It must gladden your old mother's heart to see you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你家老太太看见你准心里喜欢.

sentence.Network_en: Rich, intoxicating autumn! What scene to gladden people's hearts!
sentence.Network_cn: 啊, 多么使人心醉的绚丽灿烂的秋色, 多么令人兴奋的欣欣向荣的景象 啊 !

sentence.Network_en: Don't sadden your friends and gladden your enemies.

以g开头的英语英文单词 ... glacial 冰的 gladden 使喜悦 glade 林中的空地.
...历史了,它与政府这一概念以及文明的兴起一样历史悠久。正如格拉登(Gladden)指出的那样,行政的某种模式自从政府出现之后就一直 …
综合英语单词表(第二册下) - 豆丁网 ... fringe n. 边缘；外围 gladden v. 使高兴；使愉快 humiliate v. 羞辱；使丢脸.

RelatedPhrase.word: fruitful regions gladdened by plenty and lulled

list.key: fruitful regions gladdened by plenty and lulled
list.abs: fruitful regions gladdened by plenty and lulled by peace ! ( bSamuel Johnson )由于繁荣而快乐，由于和平而平静的富饶地区！(b塞缪尔约翰逊)
Do you find any pleasure in gladden ?, 您喜欢园艺吗?
Refresh and gladden my spirit . Purify my heart. Illumine my powers ., 请振奋和愉悦我的灵魂 , 净化我的心田 , 激发我的力量.

entry.tran: 使心花怒放；使充满希望
entry.def: If you say that something gladdens someone's heart, you mean that it makes them feel pleased and hopeful.

example.ex: ...a conclusion that should gladden the hearts of all animal-rights activists.
example.tran: 会使所有动物权益保护者欢欣鼓舞的结论

entry.def: If something gladdens you, it makes you feel happy and pleased.

example.ex: Charles's visit surprised him and gladdened him.
example.tran: 查尔斯的来访让他惊喜交集。

auth_sentence.content: That all the Alps may gladden in thy might.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That all the Alps may gladden in thy might.
